name: Level Up Action
slogan: Leading feminist campaigns in the UK
description:
Using digital tools and tactics, we mobilise thousands of feminists from across the UK to take action on the issues that matter to them - and win. So far this has included petitions to the press regulator calling for more sensitive reporting on domestic violence, and e-mailing ITV directors to take plastic surgery ads off-air. 

The job is as flexible and creative as you are!

jobs.title: Developer
jobs.description:
We need an independent, creative and most importantly feminist developer who is willing to take the lead on creating innovative digital tools and maintaining our website and database. 

Knowledge of Ruby is essential, as are the abilities to learn quickly, communicate honestly and be part of a small team.

Our stack:
We’re using apps that are being worked on by international partner organisations, in the process of being open-sourced, including our main action platform.

Our platforms are made up of several small to medium-sized apps which exchange data via webhooks and APIs. The main ones are:

Speakout - petitions, email-to-target, fundraising and surveys for our members

Identity - a CRM for securely keeping track of members’ details

Please note: Salary will be pro-rated to two days per week, with the possibility of more work as the organisation grows.
